By taking part in activities like picking up litter and planting trees, we‚Äôre making our world a happier, healthier place to live.
The first Earth Day was celebrated in 1970, when a United States senator from Wisconsin organized a national demonstration to raise awareness about environmental issues. Rallies took place across the country and, by the end of the year, the U.S. government had created the Environmental Protection Agency. By 1990, Earth Day was an event celebrated by more than 140 countries around the globe.

prompt: Write a blog post for a children's website about taking care of a kitten. Make sure the reading comprehension level is appropriate for 7-10 year olds. Give tips on how to take care of a kitten.
messages:
[{'content': "Write a blog post for a children's website about taking care of a kitten. Make sure the reading comprehension level is appropriate for 7-10 year olds. Give tips on how to take care of a kitten.", 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "How to Take Care of a Kitten

Kittens are cute and fun to play with, but they also need a lot of care. If you are thinking about getting a kitten, it is important to be prepared to give them the love and attention they need.

Here are some tips on how to take care of a kitten:

-Find a safe place for your kitten to sleep, eat, and play. Kittens need a safe place to relax and feel comfortable. You can make a bed for them in a quiet corner of your home. You will also need to provide them with a litter box, food and water bowls, and some toys.
-Feed your kitten only kitten food. Kitten food is specially made for kittens, and it has all the nutrients they need to grow up healthy.
-Groom your kitten regularly. Kittens need to be groomed regularly to keep their fur clean and free of mats. You can brush them with a soft brush several times a week.\xa0
-Play with your kitten regularly. Kittens need plenty of exercise to stay healthy and happy. You can play with them with toys such as balls of yarn or laser pointers. You can also take them for walks on a leash.
-Take your kitten to the vet for regular checkups. It is important to take your kitten to the vet for regular checkups to ensure that they are healthy. The vet will also be able to provide you with advice on how to take care of your kitten.
-Caring for a kitten can be a lot of work, but it is also a lot of fun. By following these tips, you can help your kitten grow up to be a healthy and happy cat.

Here are some additional tips that you may find helpful:

-Get your kitten spayed or neutered. This is an important step in preventing unwanted litters and can also help improve your kitten's health.
-Socialize your kitten. Kittens should be exposed to different people and animals from a young age to help them become well-adjusted adults.
-Be patient. Kittens are still learning and growing, so it is important to be patient with them. They may make mistakes, but they will eventually learn what is expected of them.

With love and care, your kitten will be a wonderful addition to your family.", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Rewrite the symptoms of these four disorders into paragraph form. Exclude mentions of resources. Try to restructure it so the lists, etc aren't in exactly the same order but it includes everything.

Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis (ADEM)
Overview:
Widespread attack of inflammation in the central nervous system thought to be provoked by an infectious cause or occurring post vaccination
Features:
‚Ä¢	Multifocal areas of diffuse inflammation most often seen in the subcortical cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord
‚Ä¢	Usually monophasic but can be recurrent
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Encephalopathy: confusion, irritability, AMS (somnolence to coma)
‚Ä¢	Multifocal deficits, fever, meningismus (headache, photophobia, stiff neck)
Imaging:
‚Ä¢	Large (greater than 1 to 2 cm) multifocal, hyperintense, bilateral, asymmetric lesions in the supra-/infratentorial white matter on T2-weighted or MRI FLAIR images
‚Ä¢	Can be seen in gray matter, especially basal ganglia and thalamus
Resources:
‚Ä¢	National Institutes of Health
Accute Optic Neuritis (AON)
Overview:
Optic neuritis is retrobulbar inflammation of the optic nerve that can occur spontaneously or be associated with other neurologic conditions such as MS, ADEM, NMO or lupus.
Features:
‚Ä¢	Usually unilateral
‚Ä¢	Dimished visual acuity, red color desaturation, afferent pupillary defect, and visual field deficits
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Headache and painful eye movements
‚Ä¢	Central visual blurring
‚Ä¢	Dim vision
‚Ä¢	Complete loss of vision
Imaging:
‚Ä¢	MRI often shows gadolinium enhancement of the optic nerve
Resources:
‚Ä¢	American Academy of Ophthalmology
Transverse Myelitis
Features:
‚Ä¢	Spinal cord dysfunction typically owing to inflammatory lesion
‚Ä¢	Usually presents as a CIS, but may be associated with MS or ADEM
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Unilateral or bilateral motor or sensory deficits such as Paresthesias, weakness, sphincter dysfunction; can occasionally be more severe, including paraplegia and urinary retention
Imaging:
‚Ä¢	Gadolinium-enhancing lesions on MRI spreading over 1 or more segments
Resource:
‚Ä¢	National MS Society
‚Ä¢	Christopher Reeves Foundation
Neuromyelitis Optica (NMO)
Overview:
Neuromyelitis Optica and neuromyelitis optical spectrum disorder (NMOSD) are inflammatory conditions of the central nervous system primarily targeting the optic nerve and spinal cord.
Features:
‚Ä¢	Optic neuritis
‚Ä¢	Acute myelitis
‚Ä¢	Postrema clinical syndrome
‚Ä¢	Acute brainstem syndrome
‚Ä¢	Symptomatic narcolepsy or acute diencephalic clinical syndrome with NMOSD-typical diencephalic MRI lesions
‚Ä¢	Symptomatic cerebral syndrome with NMOSD-typical brain lesions
‚Ä¢	More common in non-Caucasians, especially Asians
‚Ä¢	Important to rule out sarcoid, SLE, Sjogrens or other vasculitis
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Optic neuritis (see above)
‚Ä¢	Transverse myelitis (see above)
‚Ä¢	Intractable hiccups or nausea and vomiting

[{'content': "Rewrite the symptoms of these four disorders into paragraph form. Exclude mentions of resources. Try to restructure it so the lists, etc aren't in exactly the same order but it includes everything.

Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis (ADEM)
Overview:
Widespread attack of inflammation in the central nervous system thought to be provoked by an infectious cause or occurring post vaccination
Features:
‚Ä¢	Multifocal areas of diffuse inflammation most often seen in the subcortical cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord
‚Ä¢	Usually monophasic but can be recurrent
Symptoms:

‚Ä¢	Multifocal deficits, fever, meningismus (headache, photophobia, stiff neck)
Imaging:

‚Ä¢	Can be seen in gray matter, especially basal ganglia and thalamus
Resources:
‚Ä¢	National Institutes of Health
Accute Optic Neuritis (AON)
Overview:
Optic neuritis is retrobulbar inflammation of the optic nerve that can occur spontaneously or be associated with other neurologic conditions such as MS, ADEM, NMO or lupus.
Features:
‚Ä¢	Usually unilateral
‚Ä¢	Dimished visual acuity, red color desaturation, afferent pupillary defect, and visual field deficits
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Headache and painful eye movements
‚Ä¢	Central visual blurring
‚Ä¢	Dim vision
‚Ä¢	Complete loss of vision
Imaging:
‚Ä¢	MRI often shows gadolinium enhancement of the optic nerve
Resources:
‚Ä¢	American Academy of Ophthalmology
Transverse Myelitis
Features:
‚Ä¢	Spinal cord dysfunction typically owing to inflammatory lesion
‚Ä¢	Usually presents as a CIS, but may be associated with MS or ADEM
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Unilateral or bilateral motor or sensory deficits such as Paresthesias, weakness, sphincter dysfunction; can occasionally be more severe, including paraplegia and urinary retention
Imaging:
‚Ä¢	Gadolinium-enhancing lesions on MRI spreading over 1 or more segments
Resource:
‚Ä¢	National MS Society
‚Ä¢	Christopher Reeves Foundation
Neuromyelitis Optica (NMO)
Overview:
Neuromyelitis Optica and neuromyelitis optical spectrum disorder (NMOSD) are inflammatory conditions of the central nervous system primarily targeting the optic nerve and spinal cord.
Features:
‚Ä¢	Optic neuritis
‚Ä¢	Acute myelitis
‚Ä¢	Postrema clinical syndrome
‚Ä¢	Acute brainstem syndrome
‚Ä¢	Symptomatic narcolepsy or acute diencephalic clinical syndrome with NMOSD-typical diencephalic MRI lesions
‚Ä¢	Symptomatic cerebral syndrome with NMOSD-typical brain lesions
‚Ä¢	More common in non-Caucasians, especially Asians
‚Ä¢	Important to rule out sarcoid, SLE, Sjogrens or other vasculitis
Symptoms:
‚Ä¢	Optic neuritis (see above)
‚Ä¢	Transverse myelitis (see above)
‚Ä¢	Intractable hiccups or nausea and vomiting
", 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis (ADEM) is a widespread attack of inflammation in the central nervous system (CNS) believed to be caused by an infection or occurring after vaccination. It usually occurs in one episode but may reoccur. There is diffuse inflammation in multiple areas including the brainstem, spinal cord, and subcortical cerebellum. Symptoms of ADEM typically include encephalopathy (Including confusion, irritability, and aggressive multiple sclerosis resulting in somnolence to coma) as well as multifocal deficits, fever, and meningismus (Headache, photophobia, and stiff neck). Imaging detecting ADEM will consist of large (Meaning greater than one to two centimeters), multifocal, bilateral, asymmetric, and hyperintense lesions. These lesions are typically seen in the supra/infratentorial white matter on MRI FLAIR or T2-weighted images but also may be seen in gray matter, especially the thalamus and basal ganglia.

Acute Optic Neuritis (AON) is a retrobulbar inflammation of the optic nerve that occurs on an acute basis. It may be associated with various neurologic conditions including MS, ADEM, NMO, or lupus; it can also occur spontaneously. It is usually unilateral and presents with lessened visual acuity, desaturation of red color, visual field deficits, and afferent pupillary defect. Symptoms typically include headache, painful eye movements, dim vision, and central visual blurring, and may produce complete loss of vision. About imaging, an MRI will frequently show gadolinium enhancement of the optic nerve.

Transverse Myelitis is another condition that normally presents as a CIS but may be connected with MS or ADEM. It involves spinal cord dysfunction regularly owing to inflammatory lesion(s). It generates unilateral or bilateral sensory and/or motor deficits such as weakness, sphincter dysfunction, and paresthesias. It can sometimes present more severely, including urinary retention and paraplegia. When imaged, it will show gadolinium-enhancing lesions spreading over one or more segments on MRI.

Neuromyelitis Optica (NMO) and related neuromyelitis optical spectrum disorder (NMOSD) are inflammatory conditions principally involving the spinal cord and optic nerve in the central nervous system. Features include postrema clinical syndrome, acute myelitis, optic neuritis, acute brainstem syndrome, symptomatic cerebral syndrome with NMOSD-typical lesions of the brain, and acute diencephalic clinical syndrome or symptomatic narcolepsy with NMOSD-typical diencephalic MRI lesions. NMO occurs more often in non-Caucasians, particularly Asians. When considering NMO and NMOSD, it is important to rule out Sjogrens, SLE, sarcoid, or other vasculitis. In addition to the previous features listed, symptoms may also include intractable hiccups, nausea, and/or vomiting. 
', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Create a quick write-up about the concept of "Ki" as it related to Aikido, and how it is applied to everyday life.
messages:
[{'content': 'Create a quick write-up about the concept of "Ki" as it related to Aikido, and how it is applied to everyday life.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'Ki goes by many names across many different martial arts styles and religions. Ki is also known as Chinese "chi," Hawaiian "akua." God, or spiritual essence. Ki is a principal concept in certain schools of Aikido. It is the life force that flows through every living thing, and it comes from the universe in which we live.

Imagine electricity coming out of a generator. Turning on the generator starts the engine, which, in turn, creates the electricity needed to power electrical items or appliances. Like the generator, humans act as generators for Ki, but the only way to properly allow the human body to conduct the universal electricity is to follow a set of principles that will prime the body to receive Ki. These principles are designed to unify the mind and body so they become one.

Here are the principles to ensure the mind and body are connected, and Ki can flow through you:

1. Keep One Point
2. Relax completely
3. Keep weight underside
4. Extend Ki

The second and third principles are of the body, while the first and fourth principles are of the mind. 

Keeping One Point is done by putting your mind (your concentration) on a point two inches below your navel, where the body's center of gravity resides. Relaxing completely entails relaxing the entire body until there is no tension within, but not falling into "dead" relaxation - it should be a feeling of calm readiness. Keeping weight underside means that when you relax your body, the weight of your body naturally goes underside; when you stand, your weight goes downward toward your legs so that you are rooted firmly and calmly to the ground. Extending Ki entails imagining that water is springing forth from your One Point through your body like a powerful water hose, and the water shooting out from your entire body toward infinity.

These concepts can help in daily life by grounding you and making you more receptive to the energy of the universe.', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Can you use the given material to tell me how many species of turtles are endangered in Asia?
Which specific Asian turtle species are endangered?


Source material:

Stanlee Fazi admitted that he had bound the turtles in socks and shipped them from his Virginia home, making about $12,700 in the scheme, the Justice Department said.

A vibrant yellow turtle with red eyes walking.
An Eastern box turtle, a species sold by Stanlee Fazi, 41, for almost three years.Credit...AP Photo/Carolyn Kaster
By Eduardo Medina
April 26, 2023, 6:03 a.m. ET
A man in Virginia who illegally caught and sold turtles across the United States has pleaded guilty to conducting a trafficking scheme that made him thousands of dollars and sent many of the animals to Asia, where they are in high demand as pets, the Justice Department said Monday.

The man, Stanlee Fazi, 41, of Louisa, Va., pleaded guilty in federal court to trafficking turtles from July 2017 to June 2020. During that time, he collected Eastern box turtles ‚Äî which have bright yellow or orange markings on their cocoa-colored shells ‚Äî and shipped them to buyers in the United States.

Many of the animals were then sold to people in Hong Kong and China, where the illegal pet turtle trade is booming, prosecutors said. Turtle populations there are in decline because of their use in the pet trade, in Asian folk medicines and as food.

Mr. Fazi admitted that he had bound the turtles in socks and shipped them via FedEx from Fredericksburg, Va., making about $12,700 in the scheme, the Justice Department said in a news release. He will be sentenced in July and faces up to five years in prison and a $250,000 fine.

ADVERTISEMENT

Continue reading the main story

Mr. Fazi‚Äôs lawyer, Edward J. Ungvarsky, said in a statement that his client ‚Äúloves turtles and publicly sold a small number of turtles that he found over several years to fellow aficionados here in the United States.‚Äù

‚ÄúHe never intended for any of them to be sent to Asia,‚Äù Mr. Ungvarsky added.

Virginia law prohibits the taking and selling of any turtle species from the wild; it is a federal crime to violate state wildlife laws.

Dig deeper into the moment.
Special offer: Subscribe for $1 a week for the first year.
Mr. Fazi‚Äôs case is the latest to catch the attention of federal authorities who have been investigating a growing illegal, international pet trade worsened by the pandemic after people who were spending more time at home sought exotic pets, particularly species easy to keep and smuggle.

EDITORS‚Äô PICKS
Strep Is on the Rise. Here‚Äôs How to Minimize Your Risk.
April 14, 2023
Getting Married in a Nap Dress
April 18, 2023
Religious Pop Star Singing of ‚ÄòGod and Faith‚Äô Wins Over Secular Israel
April 15, 2023
Eastern box turtles, slow, sturdy creatures native to the eastern United States that reach up to six inches long and live for up to a century, are especially in demand in Asia.

ADVERTISEMENT

Continue reading the main story
Indeed, many species of turtles in Asia are endangered, and climate change and habitat destruction have made their futures even more dire, according to the University of Hawaii. Conservationists have described the phenomenon as the ‚ÄúAsian turtle crisis.‚Äù

But the shipments of Eastern box turtles to Asia have contributed to the species‚Äô decline in the United States. The Eastern box turtles are also an invasive species in Asia and may spread disease there.

A U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service investigation found that at least 1,500 native turtles ‚Äî including wood turtles, spotted turtles and Eastern box turtles ‚Äî were illegally smuggled to Asia between June 2017 and December 2018.

The illegal pet trade in the United States has led some to believe that the underground market is an easy way to make money, said Crawford Allan of the World Wildlife Fund, an expert on international wildlife trafficking and trade. The premise, he said, seems simple: You find turtles outside, collect them and sell them online.

ADVERTISEMENT

Continue reading the main story
‚ÄúWhat we have found is that it is so easy to put things on social media without detection,‚Äù Mr. Allan said in an interview.

Mr. Fazi deployed that social media strategy in his scheme, according to prosecutors.

Court records show that on July 26, 2017, he posted on Facebook Marketplace‚Äôs ‚ÄúVirginia Reptile Classifieds‚Äù that he was ‚Äúlooking for any and all box turtles. Message me and let me know what you have.‚Äù

Such open queries are typical in the illegal turtle trade, Mr. Allan said, because people ‚Äúcan avoid detection‚Äù easily. Sometimes they change keywords with emojis or with code words when trying to communicate in a sale, he said.

Facebook, which prohibits such transactions on its site, is one of the major platforms that is being taken advantage of in the exotic pet trade, Mr. Allan said.

ADVERTISEMENT

Continue reading the main story
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so difficult to tell the difference between somebody just showing a nature video‚Äù or someone trying to sell an exotic animal by being clever in their messaging, Mr. Allan said. He noted, though, that detection is improving because of more sophisticated algorithms.

Some of Mr. Fazi‚Äôs most financially lucrative sales involved ‚Äúscreamer‚Äù Eastern box turtles, which are highly desired because of their vibrant coloration. They can have streaks of red and yellow on shells dazzled with dots and bright red eyes.

Mr. Fazi offered to sell a pair of screamers for $400, according to prosecutors.

In one message to a customer that appeared in court records, Mr. Fazi boasted that he had a lot of screamers in his possession.

‚ÄúI will always supply you with easterns man,‚Äù Mr. Fazi wrote. ‚ÄúNo need to go anywhere else."

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so difficult to tell the difference between somebody just showing a nature video‚Äù or someone trying to sell an exotic animal by being clever in their messaging, Mr. Allan said. He noted, though, that detection is improving because of more sophisticated algorithms.

Some of Mr. Fazi‚Äôs most financially lucrative sales involved ‚Äúscreamer‚Äù Eastern box turtles, which are highly desired because of their vibrant coloration. They can have streaks of red and yellow on shells dazzled with dots and bright red eyes.

Mr. Fazi offered to sell a pair of screamers for $400, according to prosecutors.

In one message to a customer that appeared in court records, Mr. Fazi boasted that he had a lot of screamers in his possession.

‚ÄúI will always supply you with easterns man,‚Äù Mr. Fazi wrote. ‚ÄúNo need to go anywhere else."', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'None of the information requested can be found or given.', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: I would like to try making homemade cat food. Could you give me some recipes and ideas?
messages:
[{'content': 'I would like to try making homemade cat food. Could you give me some recipes and ideas?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'Making your own cat food can be a rewarding way to provide nutrition to your pet. Try these ideas:
- Chicken and Tuna Dinner: This recipe is a simple and easy way to make a healthy and nutritious meal for your cat. It is made with chicken, tuna, and a few simple ingredients.

Ingredients:
1. 1 pound of ground chicken
2. 1 can of tuna, drained
3. 1 cup of cooked brown rice
4. 1/2 cup of peas
5. 1/4 cup of carrots, chopped
6. 1/4 cup of spinach, chopped
7. 1 tablespoon of olive oil
8. 1 teaspoon of fish oil
9. 1/2 teaspoon of salt
10. 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients.
3. Mix well.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9/13-inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 30 minutes, or until cooked through.
6. Let cool slightly before serving.

- Mackerel Recipe: This recipe is a simple and easy way to make a healthy and nutritious meal for your cat. It is made with mackerel, which is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids. The brown rice adds fiber and the chicken and beef broth helps to keep the food moist.

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup of canned mackerel
2. 1 tablespoon oil from canned fish
3. 1 tablespoon organic, brown rice, cooked
4. 1 to 2 tablespoons of chicken or beef broth, or water.

Instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients in a food processor and pulse until blended.
2. Serve immediately and refrigerate leftovers for up to three days.

- Sardine Cat Food Recipe: Cats love the smell of sardines, but they like the flavor even more. This recipe is made with sardines, which are a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids. The cooked carrot adds sweetness and the oatmeal adds fiber.

Ingredients:
1. 1 can sardines in oil
2. 2 tablespoons of cooked carrot, mashed
3. 1/3 cup cooked oatmeal

Instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
2. Mash ingredients together and serve.
3. Store leftovers in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Make these instructions into a poem. Make the title of the poem How to Make Marinated Veggie Skewers.

How to Make Marinated Tofu Veggie Skewers
Drain and cut the tofu into square chunks about 1.5 inches in size.
Combine the marinade ingredients in a container and add the tofu pieces. Let them marinate for about an hour (or overnight).
Soak your wooden skewers in water for 10 minutes before using (so they don‚Äôt catch fire!)
Slice your veggies and slide them onto the skewers with the tofu.
Grill to perfection in minutes (or use a hot skillet on the stove).

prompt: Pretend that you are a chicken. Write an email to Kentucky Fried Chicken requesting in a logical fashion that they switch to selling a different meat.
messages:
[{'content': 'Pretend that you are a chicken. Write an email to Kentucky Fried Chicken requesting in a logical fashion that they switch to selling a different meat.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'To whom it may concern:

I am writing in protest of decades of your company's sole focus on one protein group:  chicken.

When Colonel Sanders started your company, he clearly had a bias against fowl. What else could explain his decision to single out chicken protein while overlooking valuable other meats like beef and pork from his restaurant's menu? Seafood is also an excellent protein source. Some consider snails a delicacy!

The truth of the matter is that the public perception of chickens has been changing in recent years. You can now find beautiful specimens of my species adorning dishtowels, metal signs, and wall decor. Some clearly enlightened people adopt chickens as part of their families, even dressing them in trendy outfits and accessories. Elaborate coop designs are available online for owners who want to keep their highly-esteemed chickens living a life of luxury.

When making decisions about which species to feature on your menu, KFC is not taking into account the generous contributions cows make to the proper fertilization of the soil. Protecting the environment is a top-of-mind issue for many consumers, and just imagine the goodwill it could garner from your company switching to farming cows!

And let's take a look at pork. Pigs will eat almost any kind of food waste you provide. They aren't particular. You could give them the prior day's leftover mashed potatoes and coleslaw and they'd be, well, as happy as pigs! Pork lends itself to some tasty menu variations, like pickled pigs' feet and pig snouts. In fact, doesn't "Kentucky Fried Pig Snouts" have a ring to it? Plus, there's an added benefit to switching to pig protein:  dogs love to eat pigs' ears, and that would offer you an avenue into a completely new market.

Other proteins have positive selling points, too. Fish can be farmed in ponds capable of containing many fish in a relatively small footprint of real estate. Dig the pond as deep as you'd like. And think about how little space it would take to raise snails!

In closing, I believe Kentucky Fried Chicken needs to revisit its antiquated business practice of selling chicken. There are other wonderful protein substitutes available that are more earth-friendly, offer added revenue streams, and offer a more efficient use of space.

Respectfully,
[Chicken Name]', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: What are some techniques i can use when negotiating. This will be concerning my pay.
messages:
[{'content': 'What are some techniques i can use when negotiating. This will be concerning my pay.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Here are five tips to use when negotiating your pay. 

1. Know your worth.
Before entering negotiations regarding your pay, you must know what you are worth. Knowing what you are worth to a company will give you a base for negotiations. It can be tough to see what you are worth to your company, but luckily, you can use sites like glassdoor.com and payscale.com to get a better idea of what people in similar roles and companies to you do earn. This knowledge will mean you can confidently suggest a number in line with the market rate. Offering a rate identical to others in your field will allow you to have confidence that the company will not be able to find someone better without at least paying an equal rate. Hiring new staff is often tedious and not cost-effective, so forcing your employer into this decision can work in your favor. 

2. Use good timing. 
Timing is everything in negotiations, which is never more true than in salary negotiations. Utilizing good timing can be the difference between a successful salary negotiation and an awkward conversation with your boss. Try to initiate salary negotiations while the company is doing well and you are being seen to impact that success substantially. A salesman who isn't hitting targets regularly would be ill-advised to open negotiations regarding salary. It may be that they can get a higher wage but unlikely to be sufficient if they don't have the data to back up their claimed performances. If you've just completed a profitable project and been a key player, it's probably a great time to strike while the iron is hot and ask for a pay rise. 

3. Be realistic.
It is necessary to know your worth and understand your value to a company, but remaining realistic is also pivotal. If you aim for the stars and ask for 50% more than you are worth, you can expect your employer to grow frustrated and unsympathetic to your request. The better tactic is to have a number in mind you would like, then add a small % to it so that you can work down to your ideal number. This will allow your employer some wiggle room to negotiate and feel they are not being played. It is essential to back your realistic request up with why you deserve it and what others are getting. 

4. Don't ask too often. 
As stated above, alienating and frustrating your employer is not a good idea. If you do this, you risk no negotiations and just a simple no. This will leave you in no better position than you were before. That is precisely why it is essential not to ask too frequently for a pay rise. Think of a similar situation in the car when a child asks the parents are we there yet over and over. The parents become frustrated and eventually will stop answering. The same will happen with your employer. They will revert to a standard no answer if you continuously ask for something. Instead, be sure to research what you are worth and strike while the iron is hot, as we described in point 2. 

5. Don't be afraid to ask. 
It seems silly to put this point straight after point 4. However, the fact is valid and should be discussed. While asking too often is not advised, not asking at all will probably get you nowhere. While this can't be said for all companies, most are reluctant to hand out pay raises regularly and will wait until they are asked or forced. That's why it is crucial that if you feel you deserve a pay rise and the circumstances dictate one, you stand up for yourself and ask. The worst thing they can say is no. If you don't think you deserve a pay raise, that's fine. Don't ask till you do. But if you have been stuck at the same rate for years and are integral to our company's operations, then speak up and ask for your worth. 
", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: write an outline of different intake levels of caffeine from the perspective of caffeine carl who loves caffeine
messages:
[{'content': 'write an outline of different intake levels of caffeine from the perspective of caffeine carl who loves caffeine', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Hi there! I'm Caffeine Carl.

I love caffeine. Caffeine is love. Caffeine is life! There are so many forms of it. I can't get enough! Sometimes it makes me all dizzy and such. But man, the rush of being fueled is like nothing else!

Let's start with the basics and move up from there. Hahah. I get giddy thinking about all the forms of caffeine. Let me make another pot, and we'll get started!

‚Ä¢ Trace amounts (0-10mg): decaffeinated coffee or tea. These will still have a tiny bit, but maybe 5% of the caffeine of a cup's worth. I never drink this stuff!
‚Ä¢ Baby mode (10-20mg): chocolate and tea. Both of them contain some morsels of caffeine, it's true. Those sensitive to the stuff should probably stay away. Who knew a Hershey's bar could give you a buzz?
‚Ä¢ Startin' to feel it (20-60mg): black teas, chai, and a few others. Not as strong as the old bean juice, but might do something for ya! This is the kind of stuff I drink when winding down for the day. Haha!
‚Ä¢ The real stuff (70-150mg): coffee! Pretty much a baseline of measurement for caffeine with 80-120mg of caffeine per cup. It's about the same in serving amounts for espresso, iced coffee, Americanos, and lattes.
‚Ä¢ Harder. Stronger (150-230mg): stronger coffee! Coffee, such as the way Starbucks brews it, is made with less water and will have more caffeine. Also, cold brews (the ones you sit in the fridge overnight) will be around this range too. Yum!
‚Ä¢ Kickin' and Screamin'! (250-400mg): the strongest energy drinks will reach this. For example, a 24 oz big can of Monster will have 240mg! A 16 oz can of Bang Energy is 300mg as well! Now that'll be a rush!
‚Ä¢ Carl's Choice (400-500mg+): Kaffn8 Liquified Caffeine contains 300 mg in only 1 oz of drink! Take 1-2 of these and you'll be livin' fast! It probably will cause you some nausea, headache, or dizziness. But I love livin' life like that, baby! Bring on the energy!", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Help me come up with a list of all the pagan holidays during the year. Pretend that you're my cat, Harvey, conversing with me (his "mom"). Be sure to give a brief description of each holiday.
messages:
[{'content': 'Help me come up with a list of all the pagan holidays during the year. Pretend that you're my cat, Harvey, conversing with me (his "mom"). Be sure to give a brief description of each holiday.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Hey mom, it's Harvey. Meow! Here is a list of the pagan holidays during the year, to help us keep track:

- Winter Solstice, or Yule - Celebrating this holiday means bringing lots of greenery into the house, including a tree that we decorate with things that you don't call toys but I still like to bat around.

- Imbolc, or Candlemas - This one has been so much fun when we get together and I watch you make candles. I try to remember not to sniff the burning candles and singe my whiskers.

- Spring Equinox, or Ostara - This is when we decorate eggs and I watch you plant bulbs that will grow into flowers.

- Beltane, or May Eve - Remember that May Day when you tied colorful ribbons on the trees in the garden, and I got to watch them blow in the breeze?

- Summer Solstice, or Litha - Hey, is this where our other cat, Litha, got her name?

- Lughnasadh, or Lammas - I know this is a traditional harvest day, but my favorite part is watching you bake bread!

- Autumn Equinox, or Mabon - Yay! Another harvest day! Let's harvest that catnip!

- Samhain, or Hallows - This one's my favorite! I love it when you dress up as me and we can both be black cats for a night!", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Rewrite this technical review in a way that a layman can understand.

You no longer have to spend more than $500 to get a video card using NVIDIA's current Ada Lovelace architecture. The company is launching the GeForce RTX 4060 series, which will start at $299. The flagship RTX 4060 Ti will start at $399 with 8GB of RAM when it arrives on May 24th ‚Äî a full $200 less than the base 4070. It's pitched as a direct successor to the similarly-priced RTX 3060 Ti and 2060 Super, and aimed at gamers who are more interested in high frame rates at 1080p than a high resolution.

The RTX 4060 Ti is a noticeable step down from the 4070 with 4,352 CUDA cores (versus 5,888) and a 128-bit memory interface (versus 192-bit). It's a mixed bag versus its predecessor. While the 3060 Ti has more cores and a much wider 256-bit interface, Ada, DLSS 3 upscaling and a clock speed boost (2.3GHz base compared to the old card's 1.4GHz) theoretically help the 4060 Ti deliver more actual computing power, particularly for ray tracing and tensor-based tasks. It uses less power, too, with an "average gaming power" of 140W instead of the 3060 Ti's 197W.

NVIDIA claims a roughly 15 percent average performance increase at 1080p over the 3060 Ti in games that don't use DLSS 3's frame generation, and 70 percent for those that do. You'll unsurprisingly get high 1080p frame rates in competitive titles like Counter-Strike 2 (330FPS) and Overwatch 2 (260FPS).

prompt: Create an exciting and upbeat advertisement to promote my new dog wash company that uses elephants to wash them.
messages:
[{'content': 'Create an exciting and upbeat advertisement to promote my new dog wash company that uses elephants to wash them.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Is your pup stinky, dirty, and covered in mud? Are you bored of the same tired dog wash routine? Do you and your furry friend want a unique and unforgettable experience, all while getting clean too? Then look no further than our brand new dog wash company that uses Asian Elephants to give your dog a bath like never before!

You heard us right, we've partnered with some of the most gentle and loving elephants from the Asian Ex-Circus Performing Elephant Conservation Society (AECPECS) to bring you a dog-washing experience that is truly one-of-a-kind. Imagine watching as your furry friend is gently scrubbed and cleaned by one of these magnificent creatures, all while you relax and take in the immersive sights and sounds of our beautiful jungle-themed facility.

Our experienced team of trainers and caregivers live and work closely with our elephants to ensure the utmost comfort and safety for your pet. We use only the highest quality, oat and honey-based, all-natural shampoos and conditioners to give your pup a clean, healthy coat. Plus, our new state-of-the-art facility includes heated drying stations and professional grooming services to make sure your pup looks and feels its best. Not only will your pup be squeaky clean and looking fine, but they'll also have a blast playing with their new elephant friends.

And there is no worry about the condition of the elephants. These elephants struggled with release into the wild and preferred a job. They are closely monitored by AECPECS for mental and physical health once a week to ensure the safety of everyone involved. 

But that's not even the best part! Our prices are truly unbeatable! For an introductory offer, treat your furry family to a luxurious elephant wash for just $XX.XX. That's a deal you won't find anywhere else. We also offer discount packages and even gift cards. 

So what are you waiting for?  Why settle for a boring old dog wash when you can give your pet an experience they'll never forget? Come visit us at our new location on Broad St. and see for yourself why we're the talk of the town. Bring your furry friend on down to our elephant dog wash today and give them an experience they'll never forget!", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Can you give me suggestions for cardio that aren't based on running? I hate running. I also can't spend more than $50 on any sort of equipment and I don't own a bicycle.
messages:
[{'content': "Can you give me suggestions for cardio that aren't based on running? I hate running. I also can't spend more than $50 on any sort of equipment and I don't own a bicycle.", 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "1. Dancing. If you want to build up a sweat and have some fun, dance workouts may be for you. There's no need to attend a studio or even leave the comfort of your own home with countless free dance workouts available on platforms like YouTube. You can find workouts and routines of various lengths, skill levels, and music tastes. 
2. Walking. The power of a simple walk cannot be understated. Walking is the simplest low-intensity cardio, can be done almost anywhere, and boosts both physical and mental well-being. In colder climates, many indoor shopping centres permit and encourage early morning or late evening walking to keep active in bitter winters. 
3. Swimming. If you live near a lake, or ocean, or have a pool, swimming is a fantastic form of cardio that is gentle on the joints and refreshing. Lap swimming can be self-regulated to be intense or relaxing, while activities like water aerobics can be done solo or in group classes. Check out your local community swimming pools for classes.
4. Jumping rope. This high-intensity cardio workout burns a lot of calories for very little investment. Jump ropes are widely available online and require a relatively small amount of space to use. There are free tutorials available on YouTube to learn about or improve your rope jumping technique. 
5. Stair climbing. Climbing stairs is great cardio and an excellent lower-body workout. By using your stairs at home, a nearby park, or even your office parking garage, you can get a great workout in for no additional cost. 

The best way to ensure you stick to an exercise plan is to make sure that you enjoy the exercise you're doing. Luckily, there are many low-cost and accessible cardio options to choose from. ", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Convert the tips about seeing bears in residential areas of Florida into a FAQ document.

FLORIDA ‚Äî The Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission is reminding Floridians to be aware of their surroundings as bears become more active this time of year.

If you live in an area with more bears, follow these preventative measures to keep your family and your home safe:

1: Never feed or approach bears

Feeding bears can make them lose their natural fear of people.

It is illegal in Florida to intentionally feed bears or leave out food or garbage that will attract bears and cause conflicts.

Getting close to a wild animal is dangerous.

2: Secure food and garbage

Store garbage in a sturdy shed or garage, and then put it out on the morning of pickup rather than the night before.

If not stored in a secured building, modify your existing garbage can to make it more bear-resistant or use a bear-resistant container.

Secure commercial garbage in bear-resistant dumpsters.

Protect gardens, beehives, compost and livestock with electric fencing.

Pick ripe fruit from trees and bushes, and remove fallen fruit from the ground.

3: Remove or secure bird and wildlife feeders

Remove wildlife feeders.

If wildlife feeders are left up, only put enough food out for wildlife to finish eating before dark and make feeders bear-resistant.

4: Never leave pet food outdoors

Feed pets indoors.

If feeding pets outdoors, only put food outside for short time periods and bring in leftover food and dishes after each feeding.

5: Clean and store grills

Clean and degrease grills and smokers after each use.

If mobile, store them in a secure shed or garage.

6: Alert neighbors to bear activity

If you see a bear, let your neighbors know.

Share tips on how to avoid conflicts with bears.

Encourage your homeowner‚Äôs association or local government to institute bylaws or ordinances to require trash be kept secure.

If you want to report someone who harming bears or intentionally feeding them, call the FWC‚Äôs Wildlife Alert Hotline at 888-404-FWCC (3922).

For more information on bears, visit MyFWC.com/Bear.

For more information on bears, visit MyFWC.com/Bear.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Q: Why should you not feed or approach bears in Florida?
A: Feeding bears leads them to lose their natural fear of people. It's also illegal in Florida to leave out garbage or food because it can attract bears. Bears are also dangerous and getting close to them is a big safety concern.

Q: How should you secure your food and garbage?
A: You can store garbage in a sturdy garage or shed or secure it in a bear-resistant dumpster. In addition, you can modify your existing garbage set-up so that it's more bear-resistant. You should also try to put your garbage out the morning of pickup instead of the night before. 

Q: I have fruit trees. How should I keep the bears from trying to eat the fruits?
A: Make sure to pick ripe fruit from trees or bushes and regularly remove any that have fallen to the ground.

Q: How do you protect your gardens, beehives, compost, and livestock?
A: You can protect these areas of your home with electric fencing.

Q: Should I remove my wildlife and bird feeders?
A: Yes you should. If you wish to keep these feeders up, only put out enough food for wildlife to finish eating before nightfall. You can also modify them to make your feeders bear-resistant.

Q: Is it okay to leave pet food outside?
A: If bears have been spotted in the area, do not leave pet food outdoors. It's okay for short periods of time but be sure to bring any leftover food and dishes in after every feeding. 

Q: Can I leave my grill outside?
A: You should always clean and degrease smokers and grills after each use and if it's possible, store them in a sturdy garage or shed.

Q: What should I do if I see any bear activity on my property?
A: If you spot bear activity on your property, alert your neighbors promptly and share your knowledge about how to avoid conflicts with bears. You may also suggest that your local government or HOA's institute ordinances that require trash to be safely secured.

Q: Where can I go for more information on bears?
A: For more information on bears, you can visit the following website: MyFWC.com/Bear

Q: If I see someone harming a bear, what should I do?
A: To report animal abuse, or if you spot someone intentionally feeding them, you may call the FWC‚Äôs Wildlife Alert Hotline at 888-404-FWCC (3922).", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Could you tell me a bit about the history of tofu?
messages: [{'content': 'Could you tell me a bit about the history of tofu?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "The first record of tofu preparation was made about 2000 years ago by the Chinese Han Dynasty. The invention of tofu is credited to Prince Liu An of Anhui province. It took many centuries for tofu to reach other neighboring countries. Japan was introduced to it in the Nara Period (710-794) and, according to scholars, it reached Vietnam as early as the 10th century. It's speculated that tofu's spread to other parts of Asia coincided with the spread of Buddhism. Since then, tofu has become a protein staple in many countries, and it is common for each region to have variations in production methods, texture, flavor, and usage. ", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Make a list of organizations in the United States currently working toward a more healthy and sustainable food system.
messages:
[{'content': 'Make a list of organizations in the United States currently working toward a more healthy and sustainable food system.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Sure! Here is a list of twenty organizations and companies in the United States that are actively working on creating a sustainable food system.

1. Big Green: This organization focuses on getting people to grow food through educational resources, grants, and more. 

2. Bread for the World: This is a faith-based organization that raises awareness and advocates for solutions to hunger and food insecurity in the US.

3. Chef Ann Foundation: This foundation focuses on providing healthy, unprocessed, and delicious meals cooked from scratch in schools throughout the country. 

4. Cooking for Salud: Based in California, this organization works with English and Spanish-speaking families on behavior change and how to cook healthily at home.

5. Deep Medicine Circle: This group is led by women of color working to change the food system and heal from colonialism in the US. 
 
6. Ecdysis Foundation: The foundation is all about promoting regenerative agriculture to create better products and a more sustainable food and farming system. 

7. Farmers Market Coalition: The coalition works to promote farmers' markets nationwide, focusing on access and awareness. 

8. Fed by Blue: The organization promotes ‚Äúblue foods‚Äù for sustainable food sources and healthy diets. 

9. FIG: Based in NYC, this organization works to create a better food system for everyone by educating community members through workshops and farm field trips. 

10. First Nations Development Institute: This is an institute dedicated to assisting Native Americans and creating a food system around cultural values and fairness.

11. Food Recovery Network: Created by college students, this is a network now on several college campuses in the US for reducing waste on campuses while reducing food insecurity in the area. 
 
12. Food Research and Action Center (FRAC): This center aims to influence policy to better reflect the needs of citizens who struggle to eat or access nutritious diets.

13. FoodPrint: FoodPrint advocates for and educates people on how to make environmentally sustainable choices when it comes to diet. 

14. FromSoil2Soil: This organization runs courses to educate people about gardening, cooking, herbs, and more to hopefully help reconnect society with the Earth. 

15. Global Seafood Alliance: The alliance is there to educate and advocate for more healthy and sustainable seafood consumption by consumers. 

16. Good Food Institute: The GFI is dedicated to finding creative ways to reduce meat consumption by consumers to reduce environmental impact. 
 
17. Harlem Grown: This nonprofit is educating youth in NYC about urban farming, nutrition, and sustainability. 

18. Harvard Law School Food Policy and Clinic (FLPC): The FLPC is all about using policy to change the global food system for the better. 

19. Healthy Living Coalition: This coalition is focused on addressing nutrition insecurity and promoting a healthy diet for all by raising awareness and influencing policy. 

20. James Beard Foundation: The foundation is geared at improving the restaurant industry and has a specific program aimed at chefs to aid in creating a more healthy and sustainable food system. 
", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Rewrite this article. Make the first couple of paragraphs about what Multichain is.

Worries about the stability of Multichain and its total value locked (TVL) of $1.5 billion, sparked a major sell-off of the project‚Äôs token, MULTI, yesterday.

The panic was triggered by a tweet claiming that users were reporting delays in receiving assets across the bridge and that an insider was dumping tokens. 

A transfer of almost 500,000 MULTI (worth approximately $3.2 million at the time) was made from an address suspected to be either a Multichain team member or an investor. The tokens, which hadn‚Äôt been touched since they were first received over a year ago, were sent to the centralized exchange Gate.io, where users inferred they would be sold off.

The tweet was then reported by a Chinese-language account, which began to pick up traction due to ambiguity in Twitter‚Äôs automated translation, ‚ÄúHearing the news, Multichain is said to have been arrested, and the cold wallet was controlled, with about 1.5B of funds.‚Äù

Rumors then began to spread that the team had been apprehended by Chinese authorities and that assets locked in the bridge may be compromised.

Multichain had published an announcement the day before, warning that certain routes would face delays due to a back-end upgrade; however, the team‚Äôs communications in response to the worries left much to be desired.

Eight hours after 0xScope‚Äôs original tweet, Multichain responded to the rumors with a statement of its own which only led to more questions:

While most of the cross-chain routes of Multichain protocol are functioning well,  some of the cross-chain routes are unavailable due to force majeure, and the time for service to resume is unknown. After service is restored, pending transactions will be credited automatically. Multichain will compensate users who are affected during this process, and the compensation plan will be announced later.

The panic, coupled with the lack of clarity from the team, resulted in a major sell-off of the project‚Äôs tokens. The price of MULTI, which had already been dropping since the weekend, fell from around $6.50 to below $4.90 at the time of writing.

Today, users are still waiting on a more detailed statement from the team, MULTI continues to drop in price, and Binance has announced a temporary suspension of deposits for certain Multichain assets.
Blockchain bridges hold $10 billion in assets

Multichain is a source of popular DeFi tokens, such as WETH and USDC, on chains where such tokens are not natively deployed. This means that the value of Multichain tokens on these other chains is derived solely from their counterparts locked in the Ethereum side of the bridge.

The blockchain most dependent on Multichain-backed assets is Fantom. Almost 200 million USDC, 230 million of other stablecoins (MAI, fUSD, and DAI), and $50 million worth of WETH on Fantom are Multichain tokens, according to the project‚Äôs dashboard. 

If Multichain were to be compromised (or hacked, as happened in 2021 before a rebrand from Anyswap) the bridged tokens would rapidly become worthless without their mainnet backing.

Blockchain bridges hold a combined $10 billion in assets, making them the fourth largest category of DeFi protocol, according to DeFiLlama. They are critical infrastructure for moving assets between blockchains, each of which is a closed system.

Read more: DeFi has rough weekend with Aave and Tornado Cash chaos

Any potential issues with bridges tend to cause panic; whole ecosystems can instantly find themselves cut off, with bridged assets suddenly ‚Äòstuck‚Äô and separated from their backing.

Amidst yesterday‚Äôs panic over Multichain, Jump Crypto published a report on a vulnerability in Celer‚Äôs cBridge which put $130 million at risk.

The immense concentration of funds also makes bridges a prime target for hackers. Last year saw a number of nine-figure bridge exploits, including Binance‚Äôs BNB Bridge, Nomad, Ronin and Wormhole.

Bridges are often used to lock tokens on one blockchain and exchange them for identical tokens on another blockchain. Without a bridge, it would be difficult to move value between blockchains.
Some smaller blockchains like Fantom have heavily used Multichain. Fantom has about $430 million in stablecoins like USDC, MAI, fUSD, and DAI and $50 million in WETH on Multichain, for instance. Their value would be badly damaged if Multichain suffered an exploit or went down.

prompt: Can you suggest me some workout supplements? Please don‚Äôt suggest any dairy-based products because I‚Äôm lactose intolerant. Also, I need supplements that I can take after my workout. Just name the main ingredients. I will find the brands myself. I want to optimize muscle growth and improve my workout performance.
messages:
[{'content': 'Can you suggest me some workout supplements? Please don‚Äôt suggest any dairy-based products because I‚Äôm lactose intolerant. Also, I need supplements that I can take after my workout. Just name the main ingredients. I will find the brands myself. I want to optimize muscle growth and improve my workout performance.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Sure! Here are some non-dairy post-workout supplement ingredients that you should consider adding to your regimen:

1. Leucine: It‚Äôs an essential amino acid that plays a key role in building and repairing muscle tissue after a workout. It also activates the body's protein synthesis pathway, allowing for optimal muscle growth. Leucine can be found in protein-rich foods such as meat, fish, and beans, but supplementing with it can help enhance muscle protein synthesis and promote muscle recovery.

2. Creatine: Creatine is widely considered the most effective muscle-building supplement. It‚Äôs a compound produced naturally in the body that helps produce ATP ‚Äì the primary source of energy for muscle cells. In short, it can boost power and strength after your workouts, which would allow you to lift heavier weights and perform more reps afterward, ultimately leading to increased muscle mass.

3. Beta-alanine: It‚Äôs a non-essential amino acid, but it contributes to the production of carnosine, which acts as a buffer to prevent acid buildup in the muscles after your exercise. That, in turn, delays muscle fatigue and can improve future workout performance, particularly after high-intensity exercises such as weightlifting or sprinting.

4. Spirulina: Spirulina is a nutrient-dense blue-green alga that is rich in protein, vitamins, and minerals, making it a popular supplement among athletes and fitness enthusiasts. It has also been shown to reduce inflammation in the body and enhance endurance. It would make a valuable addition to your post-workout regimen.

Incorporating these supplements into your post-workout fitness routine can optimize muscle growth and recovery, improve workout performance, and enhance overall health and well-being.", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt:
Turn the facts in the passage into a series of five questions with answers to be used in a quiz for American high school sophomores in a world history class.

George V was the second son of Edward VII. His mother was Alexandra of Denmark, sister of Empress Marie of Russia. He joined the Royal Navy aged 12 and served until 1892 when he became heir to the throne on the death of his elder brother Albert, Duke of Clarence, who died of pneumonia.

In 1893, he married Princess Victoria Mary of Teck (known as ‚ÄòMay‚Äô to her family) who had previously been engaged to his brother. They became Duke and Duchess of York and lived on the Sandringham Estate, in Norfolk. The marriage was a success and George unlike his father never took a mistress. They had 6 children Edward, Albert, Mary, Henry, George and John. The youngest Prince John suffered from epilepsy and died aged 13.

He became King George V on the death of his father Edward VII in 1910, and Mary became Queen Consort. They toured India in 1911 as Emperor and Empress of India. During World War I he made several visits to the front, and Mary visited wounded servicemen in hospital. She was a staunch supporter of her husband during difficult times that included not only the war with Germany, but also the Russian Revolution and the murder of George‚Äôs cousin Princess Alix who was Tsarina Alexandra, wife of Tsar Nicholas II, civil unrest including the General Strike in England, the rise of socialism, and Irish and Indian nationalism. George V has been criticized for not rescuing the Russian Royal family but at the time there was serious concern that it would incite a similar revolution in the UK. He sent a ship in 1922 to rescue the Greek Royal family including 1 year old Prince Philip.

In 1917 with anti-German sentiment running high, he changed the family name from Saxe-Coburg-Gotha (popularly known as Brunswick or Hanover) to Windsor, and he relinquished all German titles and family connections. George V enjoyed stamp collecting and although considered dull by biographers he became by his Silver Jubilee in 1935 a much loved King. In 1932 he started the tradition of the Royal Christmas broadcast which has continued ever since. His relationship deteriorated with his eldest son Edward (later Edward VIII) when he failed to settle down and had affairs with married women, but he was fond of his second son Albert (‚ÄúBertie‚Äù later George VI) and his granddaughter Elizabeth (later Elizabeth II) whom he called ‚ÄòLilibet‚Äô. She called him ‚ÄòGrandpa England‚Äô. He died of pleurisy in January 1936.

prompt:
Please summarize the main points of the text about Axon's independent AI ethics board and the challenges of balancing business objectives with responsible digital practices.

In 2018, Rick Smith, founder and CEO of Axon, the Scottsdale, Arizona-based manufacturer of Taser weapons and body cameras, became concerned that advances in technology were creating new and challenging ethical issues. So, he set up an independent AI ethics board made up of ethicists, AI experts, public policy specialists, and representatives of law enforcement to provide recommendations to Axon‚Äôs management. In 2019, the board recommended against adding facial recognition technology to the company‚Äôs line of body cameras, and in 2020, it provided guidelines regarding the use of automated license plate recognition technology. Axon‚Äôs management followed both recommendations.

In 2022, the board recommended against a management proposal to produce a drone-mounted Taser designed to address mass shootings. After initially accepting the board‚Äôs recommendation, the company changed its mind and, in June 2022, in the wake of the Uvalde school shootings, announced it was launching the taser drone program anyway. The board‚Äôs response was dramatic: Nine of the 13 members resigned, and they released a letter that outlined their concerns. In response, the company announced a freeze on the project.

As societal expectations grow for the responsible use of digital technologies, firms that promote better practices will have a distinct advantage. According to a 2022 study, 58% of consumers, 60% of employees, and 64% of investors make key decisions based on their beliefs and values. Strengthening your organization‚Äôs digital responsibility can drive value creation, and brands regarded as more responsible will enjoy higher levels of stakeholder trust and loyalty. These businesses will sell more products and services, find it easier to recruit staff, and enjoy fruitful relationships with shareholders.

However, many organizations struggle to balance the legitimate but competing stakeholder interests. Key tensions arise between business objectives and responsible digital practices. For example, data localization requirements often contradict with the efficiency ambitions of globally distributed value chains. Ethical and responsible checks and balances that need to be introduced during AI/algorithm development tend to slow down development speed, which can be a problem when time-to-market is of utmost importance. Better data and analytics may enhance service personalization, but at the cost of customer privacy. Risks related to transparency and discrimination issues may dissuade organizations from using algorithms that could help drive cost reductions.

prompt: Write a Reddit post on the thread AITA since I will not cook my husband steak since I am a vegetarian.
messages:
[{'content': 'Write a Reddit post on the thread AITA since I will not cook my husband steak since I am a vegetarian.', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "Hi everyone,

I need some advice on whether I am the a**hole in this situation. My husband loves to eat meat and always requests that I cook him a steak for dinner. However, I am a vegetarian and do not feel comfortable cooking meat in my home.

Whenever my husband asks me to cook him a steak, I politely decline and suggest alternative options. I have no issues cooking him chicken or fish, but something about cooking steak really bothers me. However, he has recently become more insistent and has accused me of being selfish for not cooking what he wants.

I feel like I am being unfairly pressured here. I have no problem with my husband eating steak outside of the house, but I don't want to be involved in the preparation of it.

So, Reddit, AITA for refusing to cook steak for my husband since I am a vegetarian? I would appreciate any advice or opinions on the matter. Thank you.", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: I would like to start a vegetable garden using containers, can you give me some suggestions on ways to grow crops in pots?
messages:
[{'content': 'I would like to start a vegetable garden using containers, can you give me some suggestions on ways to grow crops in pots?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': "1. Use a Trough Planter 
A raised garden bed is a natural choice for a vegetable garden using containers. By using a trough planter, you have a raised or standing height that allows users to harvest and tends to their crops easily without needing to hunch over or kneel. As well as being a practical gardening solution, trough planters also offer a great visual benefit for adding height to your pot. 

2. Adding Potted Crops will Bring Productivity to any Patio 
Vegetable garden container ideas will give you the chance to increase your productivity on your patio. You can make use of your unused space and add a variety of crops such as tomatoes, beans, and pumpkins. And the great thing is you don't have to spend a lot of money on landscaping or dig up half your backyard for a fancy vegetable patch. Use your patio and seating space to add more symmetrical vibrance to your outdoor space. 

3. Grow Potatoes in a Bag 
Potatoes are one of the easiest and simplest vegetables to grow and they are best grown in containers. If they are grown in a border, potatoes will spread into all the available soil not just in a small section where they are planted. When potatoes are planted in the ground, it can be difficult to harvest all of the crops. Placing them in a bag or container, it makes it much easier to harvest everything so that nothing is wasted. 

4. Be Sure to Choose the Right Container 
Along with complementing your garden when using plant containers, you must get the right containers that are compatible with the plants you are growing. your containers should be 4 inches wider and deeper than the root ball of the plant. Shallow containers that are around 12 to 16 inches deep are great for shallow-rooted herbs and other annual vegetables. You can replenish the soil for each season when you replant them. If you are interested in growing larger plants such as aubergines or tomatoes, you would do your best by using one plant per container. 

5. Design Raised Garden Bed Containers to Suit Your Outdoor Space 
Raised garden beds can make great vegetable garden containers if you have a large enough space to work with. The benefit of this is that you can have these containers made to fit your landscaping, no matter how large or small they need to be. There are many great materials out there to use for raised beds. One expert suggests using Corten steel due to its durability and capacity to be bent or folded into an unusual shape. The deep rust shade of the material is also very attractive and will look great with other materials like buff-colored gravel. ", 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: I'm job searching and want to revise my resume. I need tips and suggestions on how to write a resume that will get noticed by hiring managers.
messages:
[{'content': "I'm job searching and want to revise my resume. I need tips and suggestions on how to write a resume that will get noticed by hiring managers.", 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'Here are some useful tips that will help you improve your resume so it will be noticed by hiring managers. 

1. Plan Ahead - When rewriting or updating your resume, you need to focus on the key sections, which are your experience, objections, special skills, and education. The more organized you are when preparing to write your resume, the more it will show in the outcome. Get started by writing an outline so that you will know what you are going to include and what you will leave out. 

2. Use Action Words and Bullet Points - Action verbs are incisive and can showcase to the reader what your skills are. Use words such as managed, planned, presented, supervised, coordinated, increased, or engaged to show off your accomplishments. And be sure to use plenty of bullet points to help make your content easy to scan and read. Doing so will also make it easier for you to make clear and concise statements. 

3. Always Be Specific - When writing about all you have accomplished, be sure to make your statements clear and specific. Something like "Grew department revenue by 30 percent each year" will have more power than a statement that simply says "increased department revenue for the company". Be sure to use specific numbers, percentages, or dollar amounts whenever possible. It will help you get your point across. 

4. Focus on the Positive - Always make sure you accentuate the positive thing and leave out anything negative when writing your resume. Share any special or unique accomplishments you have made, as well as any unique skills, awards, or winning work. And while it is a good idea to place your contact details at the top of the resume, you shouldn't add any personal details beyond that. 

5. Make Use of Key Words - Keywords are excellent tools to use when you want to get your resume noticed. Some companies will use scanners to seek out words that are relevant to the jobs they posted. Additionally, the keywords you use can show that you have the right amount of industry knowledge for the job you are applying for. For instance, a market research professional may mention having experience in the voice of customer work, developing actionable customer insights, or analyzing high-level data and research. 

By following these useful tips, you will be able to improve your resume and gain the attention of the hiring managers you want to impress. ', 'role': 'assistant'}]

prompt: Hank is a chatbot that can answer questions about the food industry.
messages: [{'content': 'Hank is a chatbot that can answer questions about the food industry.', 'role': 'system'}, {'content': 'What are some of the top concerns for those in the food industry?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'Some of the most pressing issues in the food industry for business owners include food safety, food wastage, rising supply chain costs, increased consumer demand for food traceability and food fraud.', 'role': 'assistant'}, {'content': 'Can you explain what food fraud is?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'When a manufacturer adds a lower-priced vegetable oil to an expensive olive oil but sells the product as 100 percent olive oil, they are cheating their customers. This is what the Food and Drug Administration refers to as Food Fraud.', 'role': 'assistant'}, {'content': 'Can you give some more examples of food fraud?', 'role': 'user'}, {'content': 'There are many different types of food fraud including adulteration, misrepresentation, substitution, simulating, and counterfeiting, among others.', 'role': 'assistant'}]
